root.name: MRC Multi Racing Championship
root.description: MRC was a rally racing game released for the N64. The game only featured three tracks but a big selling point of the title was that the player could edit the map to close/open certain exits and ideally create an "unlimited" number of possibilities. The game was also one of the first games to allow you to swap out the Rumble Pack for the memory card so players could use both simotaniously.
